department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Procurement for General Electric J85 CAN 40 Propulsion Group aircraft spare parts (MIL)
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement J85 CAN-40 Propulsion Group for Royal Canadian Air Force CT114 Tutor Fleet**
=============================================================

**Notice Reference PW-__BB-209-28820**
--------------------------------------

**Date of Publication:** 2022-09-26
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-21T14:00:00

**Notice of Request for Information**

The Department of National Defence is soliciting market information and industry interest in responding to a potential Request for Proposal (RFP) for the General Electric J85-CAN-40 Propulsion Group systems of the Royal Canadian Air Force CT114 Tutor fleet.

**Procurement Details:**

*   Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid
*   Competitive Procurement Strategy: Not applicable - Pre-Qualification and Letter of Interest (LOI) only
*   Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: Not applicable
*   Nature of Requirements: Long-term requirement to the End of Life of the aircraft fleet

**Phased Procurement Approach:**

1.  **Phase 1: LOI and DRAFT RFP**
    The Department of National Defence seeks market information and industry interest to determine the interest in responding to a potential RFP. The DRAFT RFP and related documents are attached.
2.  **Phase 2: Virtual Industry Days**
    A virtual one-on-one industry day is planned for the middle of October 2022 (exact date to be posted on canadabuys.canada.ca).
3.  **Phase 3: FINAL RFP Release**
    The final RFP is expected to be released in November 2022.

**Key Dates:**

*   Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-21T14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
*   Expected Contract End Date: Not specified

**Competition Status:**
The tender is closed, and no further responses will be accepted.

**Contracting Entity:** Public Works and Government Services Canada

**Contact Information:**

Sylvain Desbois
Contracting Authority
Public Works and Government Services Canada
(819) 962-8660
sylvain.desbois@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

[Attachments](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents
